description.originalText: Moshira is an absolutely wonderful, caring, nurturing individual, and everything youâ€™d look for in a caregiver. She cared for our 15 month old daughter who had only ever been cared for by family. Moshira was extremely patient with my daughter who had pretty significant stranger anxiety and as a result, my daughter warmed up to her in no time. Moshira developed such a beautiful relationship with my daughter and we were so lucky to have her as part of our family. She is also a fabulous cook, and she cooked healthy meals for me and my daughter! Highly, highly recommend.

description.displayText: Moshira has worked with our family since our oldest was 4, he's now 12 and she's been with us for all 3 of our kids - now aged 12, 8 and 6.  She is terrific with the kids and they love her.  When they were babies she kept them on my schedule, made their food, cleaned bottles etc.  As they've grown, she safely drives them to all of their after school activities  She's a careful driver which I appreciate.  She puts away their laundry and keeps their rooms tidy.  She loves my kids like her own.  She is a fantastic cook and my kids love her food.  She has become a part of our family, but our kids are now all in full time school and we are working from home these days, so our needs have changed.  Anyone would be extremely lucky to have Moshira grow with their family!  Please reach out if you have any questions thanks.

description.displayText:
Moshira is an  amazing nanny! She used to watch over my niece. Her passion for child care is unparalleled, and is in class by itself. She is consistent with her qualities, character traits and also one of the most sympathetic person I have met. I would highly recommend her for any family that is need of a babysitter / nanny. Miss Moshira is very optimistic and I wish the best for her! 
Very caring!! Thank you for everything that you have done for my family. I miss you and your amazing food. 

Saima

description.displayText: I have known Moshira for over 8 years. She is the best. Loving nanny and a wonderful caregiver. She is very warm and also a amazing cook!!

description.displayText: She is very sweet, caring and goes above and beyond to make sure my child is safe. And she is very punctual!
